label: Task-14
title: Vulnerability: path transversal  in issue_path
description:
issue_path = f"{folder_path}/{FILE_NAME__ISSUE_JSON}"

in line 196 of file 

./modules/Issues-FS/issues_fs/issues/phase_1/Issue__Children__Service.py

also do a security review of the Issues_UI code base to find other cases of this insecure pattern (and see what other issues are discovered)
